name: King TD
description:
This is a prototype of an idea I had for the 7-day first-person shooter game jam.

G - Pulls out/ put away weapon

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Camera / Click to shoot

        Here I am playing around with merging the first person and tower defense concepts. This idea was fun and I used some new workflow of editing images to get them to look a certain way.

        The "King" character was done by "Pixel Frog" on itch.io: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
